readable.title: 1579798212_d30844b4c5
readable.content: a child is laying in a bubble bath holding a yellow scrubbing brush up to his mouth as if singing into a microphone . A child sings into a loofa in the bathtub A little boy is laying down in a bubble bath . Boy in bubble bath , yelling or singing into scrubbing brush . The child is surrounded by bubbles while in the bathtub .
